body.body: This application is a lightweight color range filter tool for PNG files, aimed at simplifying the process of modifying image backgrounds (specifically company logos). Users can upload multiple photos, set a specific color range, and apply changes such as making matching pixels transparent or replacing them with a new color. The tool is designed with graphic designers and frontend developers in mind, especially those seeking free alternatives to expensive and bulky commercial software.
